description: Gets the result of a segment estimate query.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: EstimateId
parameters.description: The query Id passed by a previous CreateSegmentEstimate operation.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: EstimateId
nested_items.description: The QueryId which is the same as the value passed in QueryId.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the query.

nested_items.name: Estimate
nested_items.description: The estimated number of profiles contained in the segment.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The error message if there is any error.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The status code of the segment estimate.
